result.reason: The current RDP SmartSize implementation stretches the session content when the window is resized. Adding a 'SmartSize (Aspect)' option to RDPResolutions allows maintaining the aspect ratio (via letterboxing) by dynamically resizing the RDP control.
result.approach: Add `SmartSizeAspect` to `RDPResolutions`; update `RdpExtensions` to handle the new value; update `RdpProtocol` to handle this resolution by enabling SmartSizing and attaching a resize handler to maintain aspect ratio.
